text: Easton Dudley Ashton St John McMorris (4 April 1935 – 1 February 2022) was a West Indian cricketer. He played in 13 Tests from 1958 to 1966.Wisden 1963, pp. 919–20. He toured England with the West Indies team in 1963 and 1966. He was a heavy scorer for Jamaica. He captained Jamaica from 1967-68 until he retired after the 1971-72 season. McMorris was born in Saint Andrew, Jamaica. McMorris died on 1 February 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Jamaican cricketers
title: Easton McMorris
